features: Small Rechargeable Camera: with built-in 300mAh Li-battery for emergency video record, a 1080P and 90° camera len for clear monitoring capture, smart motion detection and night vision, phone APP for lreal time remote view and FREE cloud storage, our FRM9 mini camera is definitely a great choice for you to surveillance your home, baby, pet dog and cat, office, warehouse, etc.

WiFi Remote Live View: ONLY Support 2.4GHz WiFi for live feed videos through your phone wherever you are. It would be nice home security device to help you keep an eye on everything and everybody in your house, like your baby kids, your elder parents, pets, housekeepers, nanny babysitters, roommates, unexpected intrude and burglary.

Instant Motion Detection: Our camera detects motion then it would push you notification with camera snapshots on your phone. You can check the snapshots in the APP anytime to find what has been captured. You can also set Sensitivity of this function to avoid unneeded information.

Easy File Storage: Support MAX 32G micro SD card(not included). Recommend you to insert one sd card before use so that you can playback the recording files directly in the phone APP. What's more, FREE APP cloud storage is also provided. Files saved in the APP can be read, shared and deleted.

Warm Tips: ①Please charge the camera before use; ②Recommend charging the camera while using for 7/24 continuous monitoring; ③Please set WiFi with the camera for live remote view and full APP function. ④Please feel free to contact us when you have any problems with the cameras before and after purchase. Thanks very much for your great attention.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good idea, but....
reviews.reviewText: This is a great idea, but there are physical limitations which probably can't be removed which detract from its usefulness. First, the camera has to be close to the router, which is a severe restriction. Second, the battery in the camera is small, and so for it to be effective for long, it needs to be plugged into the power source, which is also a severe restriction. When these requirements are met, however, it does a great job, with the picture being a little jumpy, but that's ok. Some of the control icons are mislabeled, but this does not interfere with the use. I like it, but can use it only in certain places.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: WHAT’S INCLUDED:-Mini Camera-Mount-USB to SD Card Reader-Micro USB Charging Cable-Short Micro USB Cable-User manualPRODUCT/THOUGHTS:It needs a lot of workI was hoping to use this camera maybe on top of my RC Cars for some interesting footage, but it just doesn’t have the ability to handle those kinds of frames. In fact, it really can’t handle hardly any frames.On the positive Side:-It does have a really small footprint-If you did use this thing as a nanny cam or whatever, you can turn the 2 toplights off so it stays in stealth mode.-It supports local SD Card recording-It’s easy to start it up and get it added to the app and the main interface is pretty simple to utilizeOn the Negative side:-as I mentioned above, the frame rate is TERRIBLE along with the quality.-I tested using manual recording to the device I had connected to it and to the SD card. There is a resolution selector on the main Interface of either 480p, 640p or 1080p, but I think that MIGHT only be for the live view.. I couldn’t get it to record in anything other than 640p. The actual recorded resolution came out to 640x472.-The quality is equally just as bad as the resolution. I’m not joking. It came out looking like a cell phone recording from 2005. There is a complete lack of any detail. I tested both in a well lit environment before I tested Night vision later on.-The frame rate was also tested at (dot)10 FPS. Not 10 but POINT 10. Again, I tested both from the local SD card and manual recording to a connected Device. I made sure to go through all my settings and I don’t see a way to record in at least higher resolution or higher quality. This is pretty much what you get. That makes the device almost unusable. You get so much ghosting on images that you would have to have exactly the right conditions to get a frame that is of decent quality.I really can’t find any proper use case scenarios for this device. The performance is just too poor to be useful. It’s unfortunate since It’s a good size, they give you a micro SD card adapter, the app COULD Be better, but it’s not completely difficult to use. I had more hope for this device but it’s juts very disappointing. I would look elsewhere for a device of this type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finicky setup not as quick n easy as should be
reviews.reviewText: Had one heck of a time achieving successful setup. The app continuously hung up on logging in to camera. After installing and reinstalling multiple times took a break and set it aside for a few weeks.When again had free time the camera magically was viewable in app. Not sure what ultimately allowed it to connect.As a lower end camera, the picture quality it only clear with camera stationary along with objects captured.It does what I want by monitoring front door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Hidden Spy Camera
reviews.reviewText: The size and features are the reasons I decided to go with this camera. These are my thoughts after almost two full months:What I Like:* The Size: It is small enough to hide just about anywhere* Feature Rich: Has Night Vision, Motion Detection, Local Storage, Live ViewingWhat I Do Not Like:* App Controlled: An app should simplify things, this one doesn't.* Ease of Use: Setting up and Configurating The CameraThere are instructions included but not detailed enough. Three different QR Codes are provided for different things. They are on the same row close to each other and my phone will not recognize them. Connecting it to my WiFi was not the issue, it was trying to add the camera to the app and where the instructions are unclear.The right size, Local SD Storage and rich in features are all good things but if I can't figure out how to set it up and operate it, what's the point. I am not able to rate Motion detection or night vision because the setup is not going well for me but since it is required field, the three stars I have provided means neutral and do not want to give an undeserving rating, either low or high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your Silent Guardian!
reviews.reviewText: Hey, have you heard about the BZZCAM WiFi Hidden Spy Camera? It's a pretty cool home security solution that's small yet powerful. You can place it anywhere in your home without worrying about it being noticed. The best part is that you can use the phone app to watch a live stream of what's happening in your house, thanks to its wireless feature.Plus, it has motion detection and night vision features that add an extra layer of security. Whether you're keeping an eye on your kids, pets, or just monitoring your home, this camera is perfect for you. BZZCAM has created a compact yet robust surveillance tool, and it's not just a camera; it's your silent guardian.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low quality Camera, Too Large to Be discrete
reviews.reviewText: The product is simple to set up and connect, which is why I rated it with three stars. Beyond that, the uses are limited because the device is larger than expected and doesn't produce useable video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these cameras
reviews.reviewText: These are so versatile I use them for EVERYTHING!!Too lazy to stand over the pot watching it, hehehe, solved! Want to see what your dog is doing while you're out? Keep an eye on your car, bike, rv or whatever. Done.Setup is download the app, turn the cam on and open the app. App asks "this one" and you are done.
